metadata.name: ISA RO-Crate Profile
metadata.description: Crate-O Mode for creating RO-Crates conforming to the ISA (Investigation-Study-Assay) RO-Crate profile. This profile enables representing ISA-JSON as RO-Crate, fully capturing experimental metadata in a FAIR-compliant format.
metadata.author: J.M. Houweling
metadata.license: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

inputGroups.name: Core Metadata
inputGroups.help: Essential metadata for the Investigation/Study/Assay. The root Dataset represents an Investigation.

inputGroups.name: Contributors & Publications
inputGroups.help: People who created or contributed to the Investigation/Study/Assay, and related publications.

inputGroups.name: Structure
inputGroups.help: How the Investigation, Studies, and Assays are organized.

inputGroups.name: Assay Specifics
inputGroups.help: Measurement method, technique, and variables for Assays.

inputs.name: additionalType
inputs.help: MUST specify the ISA type: 'Investigation', 'Study', or 'Assay'.

inputs.name: identifier
inputs.help: MUST provide an identifying descriptor (e.g., DOI, accession number).

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: MUST provide a title for the Investigation/Study/Assay.

inputs.name: description
inputs.help: MUST provide a description (e.g., abstract).

inputs.name: license
inputs.help: MUST specify the license. Default: 'ALL RIGHTS RESERVED BY THE AUTHORS'.

inputs.name: datePublished
inputs.help: MUST specify when published. Use crate creation date if not yet published.

inputs.name: dateCreated
inputs.help: SHOULD specify when created (ISA submissionDate).

inputs.name: dateModified
inputs.help: COULD specify when last modified.

inputs.name: creator
inputs.help: SHOULD specify the creator(s)/author(s)/PI(s) (ISA people).

inputs.name: hasPart
inputs.help: SHOULD specify contained Studies/Assays/Files.

inputs.name: about
inputs.help: SHOULD specify LabProcess entities (ISA processSequence).

inputs.name: citation
inputs.help: COULD specify publications (ISA publications).

inputs.name: comment
inputs.help: COULD specify comments (ISA comments).

inputs.name: mentions
inputs.help: COULD specify referenced ontologies (ISA ontologySourceReferences).

inputs.name: url
inputs.help: COULD specify metadata file path (ISA fileName).

inputs.name: measurementMethod
inputs.help: For Assay: SHOULD describe measurement type (ISA technologyType).

inputs.name: measurementTechnique
inputs.help: For Assay: SHOULD describe technology used (ISA technologyPlatform).

inputs.name: variableMeasured
inputs.help: For Assay: COULD specify target variable (ISA measurementType).

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: MUST provide a name for this process step.

inputs.name: object
inputs.help: SHOULD specify input(s) of the process (ISA inputs).

inputs.name: result
inputs.help: SHOULD specify output(s) of the process (ISA outputs).

inputs.name: agent
inputs.help: SHOULD specify performer(s) (ISA performer).

inputs.name: executesLabProtocol
inputs.help: SHOULD specify the protocol executed (ISA executesProtocol).

inputs.name: parameterValue
inputs.help: SHOULD specify parameter values (ISA parameterValues).

inputs.name: endTime
inputs.help: SHOULD specify when process was performed (ISA date).

inputs.name: disambiguatingDescription
inputs.help: COULD specify comments as 'Comment {Name = "Key", Value = "Value"}'.

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: SHOULD provide the protocol title (ISA name).

inputs.name: description
inputs.help: SHOULD provide a description (ISA description).

inputs.name: intendedUse
inputs.help: SHOULD specify protocol type (ISA protocolType).

inputs.name: comment
inputs.help: COULD specify comments (ISA comments).

inputs.name: computationalTool
inputs.help: COULD specify software/tools (ISA components - software).

inputs.name: labEquipment
inputs.help: COULD specify lab equipment (ISA components - equipment).

inputs.name: reagent
inputs.help: COULD specify reagents (ISA components - reagent).

inputs.name: url
inputs.help: COULD provide external protocol URL (ISA uri).

inputs.name: version
inputs.help: COULD specify version (ISA version).

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: MUST provide a name identifying the sample (ISA name). Represents Sample, Source, and Material.

inputs.name: additionalProperty
inputs.help: SHOULD specify characteristics or factors (ISA characteristics/factorValues).

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: MUST provide the file name (ISA name).

inputs.name: comment
inputs.help: COULD specify comments (ISA comments).

inputs.name: disambiguatingDescription
inputs.help: COULD specify file type: 'Raw Data File', 'Derived Data File', or 'Image File' (ISA type).

inputs.name: encodingFormat
inputs.help: COULD specify media format as MIME type (ISA-XLSX: Data Format).

inputs.name: hasPart
inputs.help: COULD specify data fragments using W3C data fragment selectors. SHOULD NOT be used on fragments.

inputs.name: usageInfo
inputs.help: COULD describe fragment selector specification. SHOULD only be used on data fragments.

inputs.name: givenName
inputs.help: MUST provide given name (ISA firstName).

inputs.name: familyName
inputs.help: SHOULD provide family name (ISA lastName).

inputs.name: email
inputs.help: SHOULD provide email address (ISA email).

inputs.name: affiliation
inputs.help: SHOULD provide affiliation as Organization (ISA affiliation).

inputs.name: identifier
inputs.help: SHOULD provide identifier(s) like ORCID. Can use PropertyValue for typed references.

inputs.name: jobTitle
inputs.help: SHOULD provide role/job title (ISA roles).

inputs.name: additionalName
inputs.help: COULD provide middle initials (ISA midInitials).

inputs.name: address
inputs.help: COULD provide address (ISA address).

inputs.name: telephone
inputs.help: COULD provide phone number (ISA phone).

inputs.name: faxNumber
inputs.help: COULD provide fax number (ISA fax).

inputs.name: disambiguatingDescription
inputs.help: COULD specify comments as 'Comment {Name = "Key", Value = "Value"}' (ISA comments).

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: Organization name.

inputs.name: url
inputs.help: Organization website.

inputs.name: identifier
inputs.help: Identifier such as ROR ID.

inputs.name: headline
inputs.help: MUST provide article title (ISA title).

inputs.name: identifier
inputs.help: MUST provide identifier(s) - DOI or PubMedID. Use PropertyValue for typed references.

inputs.name: author
inputs.help: SHOULD provide author(s) (ISA authorList).

inputs.name: creativeWorkStatus
inputs.help: COULD provide publication status (ISA status).

inputs.name: comment
inputs.help: COULD specify comments (ISA comments).

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: SHOULD provide comment name/key (ISA name).

inputs.name: text
inputs.help: SHOULD provide comment value (ISA value).

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: MUST provide the term name (ISA annotationValue).

inputs.name: termCode
inputs.help: SHOULD provide the identifier within the ontology (ISA termAccession).

inputs.name: inDefinedTermSet
inputs.help: COULD link to the ontology (ISA termSource).

inputs.name: disambiguatingDescription
inputs.help: COULD specify comments as 'Comment {Name = "Key", Value = "Value"}' (ISA comments).

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: Ontology/vocabulary name.

inputs.name: url
inputs.help: URL to the ontology.

inputs.name: hasDefinedTerm
inputs.help: Terms defined in this set.

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: MUST provide the key name.

inputs.name: value
inputs.help: SHOULD provide value text or number.

inputs.name: propertyID
inputs.help: SHOULD provide key ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: additionalType
inputs.help: COULD clarify the type of this property.

inputs.name: unitCode
inputs.help: COULD provide unit ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: unitText
inputs.help: COULD provide unit name.

inputs.name: valueReference
inputs.help: COULD provide value ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: MUST provide the key name.

inputs.name: additionalType
inputs.help: MUST be 'ParameterValue' to identify as a process parameter.

inputs.name: value
inputs.help: SHOULD provide value text or number.

inputs.name: propertyID
inputs.help: SHOULD provide key ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: unitCode
inputs.help: COULD provide unit ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: unitText
inputs.help: COULD provide unit name.

inputs.name: valueReference
inputs.help: COULD provide value ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: MUST provide the key name.

inputs.name: additionalType
inputs.help: MUST be 'CharacteristicValue' to identify as a sample characteristic.

inputs.name: value
inputs.help: SHOULD provide value text or number.

inputs.name: propertyID
inputs.help: SHOULD provide key ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: unitCode
inputs.help: COULD provide unit ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: unitText
inputs.help: COULD provide unit name.

inputs.name: valueReference
inputs.help: COULD provide value ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: MUST provide the key name.

inputs.name: additionalType
inputs.help: MUST be 'FactorValue' to identify as an experimental factor.

inputs.name: value
inputs.help: SHOULD provide value text or number.

inputs.name: propertyID
inputs.help: SHOULD provide key ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: unitCode
inputs.help: COULD provide unit ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: unitText
inputs.help: COULD provide unit name.

inputs.name: valueReference
inputs.help: COULD provide value ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: MUST provide the key name.

inputs.name: additionalType
inputs.help: MUST be 'Component' to identify as a protocol component.

inputs.name: value
inputs.help: SHOULD provide value text or number.

inputs.name: propertyID
inputs.help: SHOULD provide key ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: valueReference
inputs.help: COULD provide value ontology reference URL.

inputs.name: name
inputs.help: Title of the work.

inputs.name: url
inputs.help: URL to the work.
